java/liquibase/change/ChangeFactory.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.change.custom.CustomChangeWrapper;
00004 
00005 import java.util.HashMap;
00006 import java.util.Map;
00007 
00015 public class ChangeFactory {
00016 
00017     @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
00018         private final Map<String, Class> tagToClassMap;
00019 
00020     private static final ChangeFactory instance = new ChangeFactory();
00021 
00022     @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
00023         private ChangeFactory() {
00024         tagToClassMap = new HashMap<String, Class>();
00025         Class[] changes = new Class[]{
00026                 AddColumnChange.class,
00027                 AlterSequenceChange.class,
00028                 CreateIndexChange.class,
00029                 CreateSequenceChange.class,
00030                 CreateTableChange.class,
00031                 DropColumnChange.class,
00032                 DropIndexChange.class,
00033                 DropSequenceChange.class,
00034                 DropTableChange.class,
00035                 InsertDataChange.class,
00036                 ModifyColumnChange.class,
00037                 RawSQLChange.class,
00038                 RenameColumnChange.class,
00039                 RenameTableChange.class,
00040                 AddNotNullConstraintChange.class,
00041                 DropNotNullConstraintChange.class,
00042                 CreateViewChange.class,
00043                 DropViewChange.class,
00044                 MergeColumnChange.class,
00045                 RenameViewChange.class,
00046                 AddForeignKeyConstraintChange.class,
00047                 DropForeignKeyConstraintChange.class,
00048                 AddLookupTableChange.class,
00049                 AddPrimaryKeyChange.class,
00050                 DropPrimaryKeyChange.class,
00051                 AddAutoIncrementChange.class,
00052                 AddDefaultValueChange.class,
00053                 DropDefaultValueChange.class,
00054                 AddUniqueConstraintChange.class,
00055                 DropUniqueConstraintChange.class,
00056                 SQLFileChange.class,
00057                 CustomChangeWrapper.class,
00058                 CreateProcedureChange.class,
00059                 ExecuteShellCommandChange.class,
00060                 UpdateDataChange.class,
00061                 DeleteDataChange.class,
00062         };
00063 
00064         try {
00065             for (Class<Change> changeClass : changes) {
00066                 Change change = changeClass.newInstance();
00067                 tagToClassMap.put(change.getTagName(), changeClass);
00068             }
00069         } catch (Exception e) {
00070             throw new RuntimeException(e);
00071         }
00072     }
00073 
00074     public static ChangeFactory getInstance() {
00075         return instance;
00076     }
00077 
00081     public Change create(String tagName) {
00082         Class<?> aClass = tagToClassMap.get(tagName);
00083         if (aClass == null) {
00084             throw new RuntimeException("Unknown tag: " + tagName);
00085         }
00086         try {
00087             return (Change) aClass.newInstance();
00088         } catch (Exception e) {
00089             throw new RuntimeException(e);
00090         }
00091     }
00092 }
